examples.example: 我们做好准备后就快乐地出发，去探索那未知的世界。

translate.english: After we get ready, we will set off happily to explore the unknown world.

examples.example: 迎着朝阳，我们满怀信心地出发，去追寻心中的梦想。

translate.english: Facing the morning sun, we set out full of confidence to pursue the dream in our hearts.

examples.example: 当太阳升起，我们兴高采烈地出发，开启新一天的美好旅程。

translate.english: When the sun rises, we set off cheerfully and start the beautiful journey of a new day.
